org.dsa.iot.dslink

Class DSLinkFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dsa.iot.dslink.DSLinkFactory

  • public class DSLinkFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory for generating DSLink objects.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public static void start(java.lang.String[] args,
                         DSLinkHandler handler)
        Creates a DSLink provider. The provider will automatically connect and block.
        Parameters:
        args - Arguments to parse
        handler - DSLink handler

      • generate

        public static DSLinkProvider generate(java.lang.String[] args,
                                      DSLinkHandler handler)
        Creates a DSLink provider based on the arguments passed into main. The link handler does not need to set the keys or the authentication endpoint.
        Parameters:
        args - Arguments to parse.
        handler - DSLink handler.
        Returns:
        A link provider or null if the args have a help parameter passed in.

      • generate

        public static DSLinkProvider generate(DSLinkHandler handler)
        Generates a DSLink that provides a fully managed state automatically based on the configuration.
        Parameters:
        handler - DSLink handler
        Returns:
        A DSLink provider that handles when a connection is successful or a client connected to the server.
